products.name: Cream of Wheat Hot Cereal Original
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Breakfasts,Cereals and potatoes,Cereals and their products,Breakfast cereals
products.facts: ["Cream of Wheat is made from finely ground wheat, primarily durum wheat.","The product is packaged in a recyclable cardboard box, promoting eco-friendliness.","Cream of Wheat is enriched with vitamins and minerals, including iron and B vitamins, for added nutritional value.","The cereal is produced in facilities that adhere to strict quality control standards to ensure safety and consistency."]

products.name: Grape raspberry
products.facts: ["Grape raspberry is typically packaged in a 17 fl oz recyclable bottle.","The ingredients often include natural grape and raspberry flavors, with no artificial preservatives.","Grape raspberries are cultivated in sustainable farming practices to minimize ecological impact.","The product is usually gluten-free and made with high-quality, non-GMO ingredients."]

products.name: Extra Crunchy Peanut Butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters
products.labels: No gluten, Kosher, No artificial flavors, No preservatives, No artificial colors, Union Orthodoxe, Verified
products.facts: ["Made from high-quality roasted peanuts for superior taste.","Typically contains no artificial preservatives or additives.","Peanut farming can be sustainable, with practices that improve soil health.","Contains healthy fats and protein, making it a nutritious snack option."]

products.name: Almond Breeze Almondmilk Unsweetened Vanilla Aseptic
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based foods, Dairy substitutes, Milk substitutes, Nuts and their products, Plant-based beverages, Plant-based milk alternatives, Nut-based drinks, Almond-based drinks
products.labels: No GMOs, No added sugar, No lactose, Non GMO project, en:no-soy
products.facts: ["Almond Breeze Almondmilk is made from California-grown almonds, ensuring high-quality ingredients.","The packaging is aseptic, which helps to preserve freshness without the need for preservatives.","Almond Breeze is lactose-free and suitable for vegans, making it an eco-friendly alternative to dairy milk.","The production of almond milk generally uses less water compared to traditional dairy milk, contributing to lower ecological impact."]

products.name: Organic Agave In The Raw
products.categories: Breakfasts, Spreads, Sweet spreads, Sweeteners, Syrups, Simple syrups, Agave syrups
products.labels: Organic, Vegetarian, No GMOs, USDA Organic, Vegan, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made from 100% organic agave plants, ensuring no synthetic chemicals are used.","Sustainably sourced from the blue agave plant, promoting ecological balance.","Low glycemic index, making it a healthier alternative to traditional sugars.","Non-GMO and gluten-free, catering to various dietary needs."]

products.name: Everything bagels
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, Special breads, Bagel breads
products.facts: ["Everything bagels are typically made from simple ingredients including flour, water, yeast, salt, and a blend of toppings such as sesame seeds, poppy seeds, garlic, onion, and salt.","The toppings on everything bagels can provide a range of nutrients, including healthy fats from sesame seeds and antioxidants from garlic and onion.","Many brands of everything bagels prioritize using non-GMO ingredients and sustainable farming practices to reduce environmental impact.","Quality everything bagels are often boiled before baking, which contributes to their chewy texture and helps retain moisture."]

products.name: Whole Wheat Flour
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Flours, Cereal flours, Wheat flours, Common wheat flours, Whole wheat flours, Whole common wheat flours
products.labels: Kosher, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Whole wheat flour is made from the entire wheat kernel, including the bran, germ, and endosperm.","It is a more nutritious option compared to all-purpose flour, containing higher levels of fiber, vitamins, and minerals.","Whole wheat flour production can have a lower environmental impact due to the use of less refined processing methods.","Choosing whole wheat flour supports sustainable agriculture practices, as it often involves less pesticide use and promotes soil health."]

products.name: Creamy Peanut Butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Fats, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Vegetable fats, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters
products.facts: ["Creamy peanut butter is made primarily from roasted peanuts, which are ground into a smooth paste.","The production of peanuts requires less water compared to other nut crops, making it a more sustainable choice.","High-quality creamy peanut butter contains minimal ingredients, often just peanuts and salt, without added sugars or hydrogenated oils.","Peanut butter is a source of healthy fats, protein, and essential nutrients, contributing to a balanced diet."]

products.name: Great value, 100% whole wheat round top bread
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, White breads, Wheat breads
products.facts: ["Made with 100% whole wheat flour for higher fiber content.","Contains no artificial preservatives or colors, promoting a more natural product.","Packaged using eco-friendly materials to reduce environmental impact.","Baked fresh to ensure quality and taste, providing a wholesome bread option."]

products.name: Garlic & fine herbs gournay cheese, garlic & fine herbs
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Fermented milk products, Spreads, Cheeses, Salted spreads, Pasteurized cheeses, Cheese spreads
products.packaging: Metal, Recyclable Metals, Aluminium, Container, Fresh
products.facts: ["Made with fresh garlic and a blend of fine herbs for a rich flavor profile.","Typically contains no artificial preservatives, promoting a more natural product.","Often packaged in recyclable materials, supporting eco-friendly practices.","Quality is ensured through strict dairy standards and sourcing of high-quality ingredients."]
